import { useContext } from "react" import { ShopContext } from "../Context/ShopContext" export const Values = ( { CEP, cupom } ) =>{ const cep = CEP const cupomDeDesconto = cupom /* if(cupom.toUpperCase() === 'LUTZ10'){ return 0.10 } else{ return 0 }*/ //console.log(cep) console.log(cupomDeDesconto) const { priceProducts } = useContext(ShopContext) let percentual = 0.10; let desconto = priceProducts * percentual; let novoPreco = priceProducts - desconto; return(
